title: Overwatch Beta Weekend was great!
body:
Seriously, get this freaking game when it comes out. I even took a bunch of videos to help convince people!

https://youtu.be/H4TEJy13jeo
https://youtu.be/c8B6CWAuUKc
https://youtu.be/lOmpX69xQbQ
https://youtu.be/V2unrxjKaa0
https://youtu.be/3DvSNeNdBdc

But videos aside; its a great game. Other than some expected Beta issues, it ran just and looked just fine.
